content:
# I have successfully moved to the center of the stone resource patch.
#
# Now, I will attempt to harvest a small quantity of stone from this patch to gather enough for crafting the Stone Furnace.
#
# I will harvest 10 units of stone to ensure I have sufficient material.

# Harvesting 10 units of stone from the resource patch.
harvested_quantity_stone = harvest_resource(position=Position(x=-15.5, y=2.75), quantity=10)  # Harvesting stone.

# Check how much stone was harvested.
print(f"Harvested Quantity of Stone: {harvested_quantity_stone}")  # Output the amount of stone harvested.
